name: SystemsStandby
0:
”Alexa, open systems standby”
”Alexa, start systems standby”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: systems standby
des: Your modules need idling? Are you reedy to re-avert to a new set of tasks? Just say; “Alexa, Run Systems Standby” and your standby menu interface awaits.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
